OrgName.entry: MANOR PARK TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Represents tenants and residents' interests in Manor Park. The council housing stock has been transferred to the Social Landlord, Pennine 2000 (see separate entry).

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 4th Tues in the month 6-7.30pm (TARA meeting), Wed 10.30am-1.30pm (drop-in)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 2
